Package devices

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • devices.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceInterface, EventGeneratorInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Computer, DeviceWithContent, Dishwasher, Fridge, GameConsole, Television, Treadmill, WashingMachine
    public abstract class Device
extends Object
implements DeviceInterface
    Default device with no further specialization
